price: 53. (Estos) contestaron: “¡No temas! Te traemos la buena noticia del nacimiento de un niño sabio (Isaac)”.
arabic: قَالُواْ لَا تَوۡجَلۡ إِنَّا نُبَشِّرُكَ بِغُلَٰمٍ عَلِيمٖ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: qālū lā tawjal innā nubashiruka bighulāmin ʿalīmin
